item.title: D-CPT Law: Domain-specific Continual Pre-Training Scaling Law for Large Language Models
item.description: New D-CPT Law optimizes continual pre-training for LLMs by predicting optimal data mixture ratios, drastically cutting training costs.

item.title: DDK: Distilling Domain Knowledge for Efficient Large Language Models
item.description: DDK: Dynamically Distilling Domain Knowledge for efficient LLMs.
